alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 1:11AM EDT until August 25 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Mercer County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Venango County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Lawrence County in western Pennsylvania... Northern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Jefferson County in west central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... Forest County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 111 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Guys Mills to near Grove City to near New Castle, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Oil City, Grove City, Franklin, Clarion, Marienville, Knox, Rimersburg, Sugarcreek, Slippery Rock, Tionesta, Hasson Heights, Seneca, East Brady, Harrisville, Parker, Polk, Plain Grove Township, Sligo, Sandy Lake, and Emlenton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 102 and 117. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 20 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango
